attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Wish the March on wooton basset by the islamic group islam4uk to be stopped immediately.
And demand that no such Extremist  marches will ever take place there.
It is Totally disrespectful to our fallen Heroes of the British Armed Forces Their families and the rest of the General Public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
